attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
IF I WERE THE PRIME MINISTER!
ON HEAD KICKING!we would ask that legislation be made, with immediate effect that any person charged with kicking anyone in the head in any situation, will henceforth be investigated not simply for GBH, but for Attempted Murder!
 That person should be immediately detained in custody for a minimum of Three Days, while the offence is under preliminary investigation!    Where proven, the sentence imposed must reflect the seriousness of the potential injuries that MAY be caused!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
